website_summaries.verdict: Whether you’re an officer, a gentleman, or both, this beautiful watch with luxe-look stainless steel and gold band around the face features easy-to-read numbers and luminous hand and hour markers.
pros: Water-resistant to 300 feet (100 meters) like many Victorinox watches, this beauty is an all-purpose watch with a thin, elegant, and lightweight profile that you can wear from the boardroom to the clubhouse to the lap pool while maintaining style
Includes 2-year warranty if purchased from Amazon
A great value for a gorgeous watch
cons: Some wearers report the clasp can come loose too easily, or that items arrive with a bad or dead battery

customer_reviews.title: I first bought a plastic bezel infantry watch which I wore for nearly 20 years in shipyard and loved it. I also have the officer
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Victornox watch. I first bought a plastic bezel infantry watch which I wore for nearly 20 years in shipyard and loved it. I also have the officers metal watch, 32mm, which my teen aged son now wears. My wife bought me an infantry chrono with a chain mail band a few years ago which I also love but it is a bit large and bulk for everyday wear. Bought this watch as everyday wear while supporting squadron on aircraft carrier. It is the big brother of my sons watch. The watch is as usual a very fine and trustworthy time piece. I will continue to wear Victornox as long as the quality remains true.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply elegant!
customer_reviews.text: I will try to do my best for people who plan to purchase this watch, well it is a 40mm silver(brushed) gold(polished) colour case and butterfly clasp bracelet, white dial with gold numbers quartz watch, with anti reflective sapphire cyrstal. I like all the things about this watch but i changed the bracelet with a strap why because it looks too high age watch with the colour(silver&gold) it has on it, i am just 30 and makes me more mature with that, now it is much better for me, it is durable good looking watch, i highly recommend it👍
customer_reviews.author: Hope U.A.

customer_reviews.title: reliable and very accurate quartz movement -solid end links -100m water resistant (i've showered with the watch and went swimming with it) -thin profile to easily fit under any long sleeve shirt One thing I'd ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything I need in an EDC watch -very readable dial -sapphire crystal for scratch resistance -date complication -hassle free, reliable and very accurate quartz movement -solid end links -100m water resistant (i've showered with the watch and went swimming with it) -thin profile to easily fit under any long sleeve shirt One thing I'd wish is that the case to be slightly smaller. A 38mm would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Swiss army officer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price,absolutely stunning beauty,all the gold accents are shinny bright,textures are all smooth,butterfly double folding locks are beauty as well,there is a layer of plastic under and inside the bracelette and out and the claps as well,brand new,works right outta box,the pix they advertised isn't doing this watch no justice,doesn't get any better than this,modern day Rolex for the tiny fraction of the rolex,enjoying it bigtime
customer_reviews.author: watches

customer_reviews.title: Great looking rugged watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking rugged watch, great at gym, pool, or sauna. I never take my watch off so it needs to be able to take abuse. The only negative is the clasp. It keeps unhooking. There's two plungers that keep rubbing against my clothing or wrist and one side disengages. Terrible decision to use that clasp design on an otherwise fine watch. Designers blew it by using that clasp, messes up the whole watch.
customer_reviews.author: Henry F Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking excellent quality very light but smaller in size than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Hany

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love my watch! Looks more expensive than what I paid for it. Nice weight, and quality. It goes nicely with dressy or casual clothing. Looks mature and sophisticated. Eye catching!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Have to carry to shop to get adjusted to properly fit wrist..
customer_reviews.text: Watch came quickly and in exelect condition. Packaged well. Excellent quality. Had to carry to jeweler to remove two on the links so it could fit me nicely but very comfortable and Looks Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Mckay

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks nicer than the picture. Nice weight and the metal is silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the dollar. Looks good, fits well and more than I could have expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch & excellent quality at a very good price. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Campbell

customer_reviews.title: beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: high quality and distictive Swiss Army watch. local jeweler charged way too much to adjust wrist band = $30 - probaly would have folded the cost into the price of watch had I bought it locally. But, I still think it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Large numbers are easy to read. Band is nice and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: That is a very nice peace I'm so glad to have.
customer_reviews.author: jose f cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. The older person
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Good quality. The older person, the better as viewing the watch face.
customer_reviews.author: Regen222

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Love the gold band around the white face.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Mary

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful gift for my son, he love it
customer_reviews.author: Abdon Chica

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately mine didn't work and had to be returned. In addition, the battery was dead when I received it. So it goes.
customer_reviews.author: G. Yerrall

customer_reviews.title: srrj
customer_reviews.text: Excellent timepiece. Keeps perfect time. Not too heavy on wrist. Great looks. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: srrj

customer_reviews.title: The watch was not working properly. We had to ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch was not working properly. We had to take it to an expert. It was a problem with the battery that had to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Ilana Cotrim

product_meta.title: Victorinox Swiss Army Men's 241362 Officers Gent Watch
product_meta.description:
Victorinox Swiss Army, Classic Officer's, Men's Watch, Stainless Steel Case, Stainless Steel and Yellow Gold Plated Bracelet, Swiss Quartz (Battery-Powered), 241362

From Victorinox Swiss Army, the Men's Officer's Gent Watch #241362 is an elegant pick for confident individuals. Featuring a silver-tone dial with gold-tone Arabic numeral indexes, smaller numerals for tracking 24-hour time, luminous hands and a convenient date window at six o'clock, all framed by a gold-tone stainless steel bezel, this timepiece is a sophisticated classic that's easy to dress up or down. This Officer's Gent Watch also offers a 40-millimeter stainless steel case with a screw-in caseback, the sophisticated look of a two-tone stainless steel bracelet band with a deployment clasp, and the protection of a scratch-resistant, anti-reflective sapphire crystal. As befits the Swiss Army tradition, this watch is made in Switzerland and makes use of precision Swiss analog quartz movement, and it is water resistant to 330 feet (100 meters).



Victorinox Swiss Army – HistoryMaster Cutler Karl Elsener opened a cutlery shop in Ibach, Switzerland in 1884. Seven years later, in 1891, Karl supplied the Swiss Army with its standard issue Soldier’s Knife. After the death of his mother in 1909, Karl Elsener introduced the brand name Victoria and the iconic Cross and Shield emblem is registered as a trademark. With the advent of stainless steel, Karl Elsener coined the company’s name, Victorinox, by combining his mother’s name with “inox”, an abbreviation of the French word for rust-resistant steel, “inoxydable”. After World War II, the “Original Swiss Army Knife” began its successful progression around the world and enjoyed exceptional popularity. In 1989, Victorinox entered the timepiece business in the United States under the brand name “Swiss Army”. Ten years later, Victorinox joined the Travel Gear market, partnering with TRG Group in St. Louis. And in 2001, Victorinox fashion was introduced in the US to further capture the brand’s essence of practical luxury. In 2002, in order to promote global unity, the Victorinox Swiss Army timepiece brand was launched internationally. In 2007, Victorinox set up Victorinox Swiss Army Fragrance AG, and in 2009 Victorinox Swiss Unlimited was launched. 2014 marks Victorinox Swiss Army’s 130th anniversary, and each Victorinox Swiss Army product embodies the spirit of the Legendary Original Swiss Army Knife, a universal symbol of Functionality, Innovation, Quality and Iconic Design.

Brand Values

FUNCTIONALITY

Our Victorinox Swiss Army timepieces are designed to optimize their usefulness. Functionality ranges from easy-to-read dial designs to sophisticated professional functions. Every design detail is purpose-based. Functions are never add-ons or embellishments. The goal is to create watches that are timeless.

INNOVATION

Victorinox Swiss Army constantly enhances its timepiece lines with new design elements and innovative functions while seeking creative ways of upgrading existing components to enhance their capabilities.

QUALITY

Victorinox Swiss Army timepieces are designed and manufactured with the same rigorous attention to quality as the brand’s legendary Pocket Tools. They also meet the highest standards of the Swiss watchmaking industry. The quality controls and testing that every timepiece undergoes (material, movement, assembly, finishing, etc.) allow Victorinox Swiss Army to offer a three-year limited warranty.

ICONIC DESIGN

The Original Swiss Army Knife is one of the world’s most functional pieces of design. Victorinox Swiss Army timepieces share this icon’s spirit and heritage. They are multifunctional precision instruments engineered to last, yet also timeless and contemporary in design.



See more

 * Product Dimensions :5.91 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 1 Pounds

 * Department :Mens

feature_bullets: Water resistant to 330 feet (100 M): suitable for snorkeling, as well as swimming, but not diving
